verdict.summary: Referencing an attribute that doesn't exist on the resource or data source.

dead_ends.action: Using try() function to suppress the error
dead_ends.why_fails: Silently returns null; downstream resources get wrong values

dead_ends.action: Adding a variable with the same name
dead_ends.why_fails: Variables and resource attributes are different namespaces

workarounds.action: Check the provider documentation for available attributes
workarounds.how: Use terraform providers schema to list all attributes

workarounds.action: For nested attributes, check the correct nesting syntax: resource.name.block[0].attr
workarounds.how: Terraform 0.12+ changed nested block access syntax
